description: Department of National Defence, Royal Canadian Electrical and Mechanical Engineering School, in Borden, Ontario has a requirement for Digital Vehicle Technician Courseware.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal : Digital Vehicle Technician Courseware
## Procurement Details

* **Tender Reference:** W2037-240088 
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding 
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4417615152
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-16T14:00:00 (Expired)

## Contract Information

* **Contracting Entity:**
	+ Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entity:**
	+ Department of National Defence (DND)
	+ Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada
* **Expected Contract Dates:**
	+ Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-04-01
	+ Expected Contract End Date: 2025-02-21

## Notice Information

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18645312?extsite=MTg2NDUzMTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Proposal Requirements

The Department of National Defence, Royal Canadian Electrical and Mechanical Engineering School, in Borden, Ontario is seeking Digital Vehicle Technician Courseware. Proposers must clearly demonstrate their compliance with each mandatory technical criteria. Failure to demonstrate compliance will result in the offer being deemed non-responsive and given no further consideration.

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

## Contact Information

For more information or to request plans and specifications, please contact Robert.berends@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. (il-lui / he-him)
